name: pimp
description: Pimp is a small & simple (P)romise/A+ (imp)lementation that I wrote to wrap my head around the spec.

scripts.instrument: rm -fr instrumented && mkdir instrumented && jscoverage lib instrumented
scripts.cov: npm run-script instrument && PIMP_LIB_DIR=../instrumented/wrap mocha -R html-cov tests/pimpTests.js > coverage.html && npm run-script clean

author: Mudit Ameta
